eas_text: A civil authority has issued A LOCAL AREA EMERGENCY for the following counties or areas: Granite, MT; at 12:57 PM ON DEC 23, 2025 Effective until 01:57 PM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: Icy roads on I-90 from Mile Marker 150 to Mile Marker 161- Please avoid the area if possible - if you must drive the area please use extreme caution. Please avoid Interstate 90 east bound and west bound from mile marker 150 to 161 - very slick road conditions
